traits.Amphibious: The sea lion can breathe air and water.
traits.Keen Smell: The sea lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
traits.Pack Tactics: The sea lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sea lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
traits.Swimming Leap: With a 10-foot swimming start, the sea lion can long jump out of or across the water up to 25 feet.

actions.Multiattack: The sea lion makes three attacks: one bite attack and two claw attacks.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.
